headline: Board Declares Quarterly Dividend and Elects New Officer
summary: Ball Corporation's (NYSE: BALL) board of directors (the "Board") today declared a cash dividend of 20 cents per share, payable September 16, 2025, to shareholders of record as of September 2, 2025.

raw.headline: Board Declares Quarterly Dividend and Elects New Officer

headline: O-I Glass Tops Earnings Estimates in Q2, Raises '25 EPS Outlook
summary: OI beats Q2 EPS estimates and hikes the 2025 outlook as Fit to Win gains drive a strong performance in the Americas.

raw.headline: O-I Glass Tops Earnings Estimates in Q2, Raises '25 EPS Outlook

headline: Silgan Holdings (SLGN) Q2 Earnings Lag Estimates
summary: Silgan (SLGN) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -1.94% and +0.31%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
